value_type.description: The data type of the value stored in the metafield.

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the owner resource linked to this metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created.

description.description: The additional information about the metafield.

type.description: The type of data stored in the metafield.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop to which the metafield is associated.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the admin GraphQL API of the shop.

namespace.description: The namespace to which the metafield belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield.

value.description: The actual value stored in the metafield.

owner_resource.description: The type of resource that owns the metafield.

key.description: The key that identifies the metafield.
